alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 4:17PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A line of snow showers will affect central Geauga...Cuyahoga... Lake...northeastern Lorain and Ashtabula Counties Until 500 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, radar indicated snow showers along a line extending from near Conneaut to near Amherst, moving east at 20 mph. Webcams indicate low visibility and brief snow covered roads along I-90 in eastern Cuyahoga County with these snow showers. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Winds to 30 mph... Visibility dropping to less than half a mile... Brief snow covered roads under the most intense snow showers... Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Elyria, Painesville, Ashtabula, Willowick, Conneaut, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Parma, Lakewood, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Westlake, North Ridgeville, Avon Lake, Willoughby, Eastlake and Warrensville Heights. Use extra caution if you must travel. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Lorain
